nml_option.name: config_AM_discreteVarianceDecay_enable
nml_option.description: If true, ocean analysis member discrete variance decay is called.

nml_option.name: config_AM_discreteVarianceDecay_compute_interval
nml_option.description: Timestamp determining how often analysis member computation should be performed.

nml_option.name: config_AM_discreteVarianceDecay_output_stream
nml_option.description: Name of the stream that the discreteVarianceDecay analysis member should be tied to.

nml_option.name: config_AM_discreteVarianceDecay_compute_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member computation occurs on start-up.

nml_option.name: config_AM_discreteVarianceDecay_write_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member write occurs on start-up.

package.name: discreteVarianceDecayAMPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required for the template analysis member.

var.name: chiSpurHorTempBR08
var.description: Numerical temperature mixing due to horizontal advection from Burchard and Rennau method.

var.name: chiSpurHorSaltBR08
var.description: Numerical salinity mixing due to horizontal advection from Burchard and Rennau method.

var.name: chiSpurVertTempBR08
var.description: Numerical temperature mixing due to vertical advection from Burchard and Rennau method.

var.name: chiSpurVerSaltBR08
var.description: Numerical salinity mixing due to vertical advection from Burchard and Rennau method.

var.name: chiPhyVerSalt
var.description: Destruction of parameterized vertical salinity variance

var.name: chiPhyVerTemp
var.description: Destruction of parameterized vertical temperature variance
